title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Liverpool

Bypass between CR 57 and Morgan Road in the Town of Clay and Town of

Salina. (b) Bridge Street between
IR 690, exit 11, and Route 290 in the Village of East Syracuse and the Town of

DeWitt. (c) Route 635 between IR
690, exit 10, and Route 298 in the City of Syracuse, Village of East Syracuse
and Town of DeWitt. (d) Town Line

Road between Route 298 and Molloy Road in the Towns of DeWitt and

Salina. (e) Northern Boulevard
between Route 298 and IR 481, exit 8, in the Towns of Cicero and

DeWitt. (f) Schuyler Road between

Route 298 and Taft Road in the Towns of Cicero and DeWitt. (g) Seventh North Street between IR 81 (exit
25) and East Hiawatha Boulevard in the Town of Salina and City of Syracuse; provided, however, that this route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and
from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of the route will be
permitted all day Saturday and Sunday. (h) Route 5, Camillus bypass, between Route
695 and West Genesee Street in the Towns of Camillus and Geddes. (i) Route 31. Route 31 between IR 81 (exit
30) and the Baldwinsville east village line in the Towns of Cicero, Clay and

Lysander. (j) [Reserved]
(k) CR 51 (Vine Street). CR 51 (Vine Street)
between Commerce Boulevard and CR 45 (Henry Clay Boulevard) in the Towns of

Salina and Clay. (l) -(m)
[Reserved]
(n) West Genesee Street
between the exit of Route 695 and Route 173 in the Towns of Geddes and

Camillus. (o) Route 173 between

West Genesee Street and Onondaga Boulevard in the Towns of Camillus and

Onondaga. (p) John Glenn Boulevard
between IR 690 and Oswego Road (old Route 57) in the Towns of Geddes, Salina
and Clay. (q) Route 298 between IR
481 and 2320 Court Street in the Towns of DeWitt and Salina; provided, however, that the portion of this route that is encompassed by the Carrier Circle shall
be restricted from use by tandem trailers from the hours of 6 a.m. to 9 a.m. and 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. (r) Route 31. Route 31 between the Cayuga-Onondaga county line and Route I-690 in the Towns
of Elbridge and Van Buren and the Village of Jordan. (s) Route 290. Route 290 between Second

Street and North Kirkville Road in the Village of East Syracuse and the Towns
of Dewitt and Manlius. (t) [Eff. until June 22, 1994, see also subd. (t) below.] Route 20. Route 20 between IR
81 and the Onondaga-Madison county line in the Towns of Pompey and

LaFayette. (t) [Eff. June 22, 1994, see also subd. (t) above.] US Route 20. US Route 20 between the Cayuga/Onondaga
county line and the Onondaga-Madison county line. (u) Route 5 between the Cayuga-Onondaga
county line and Route 174. (v) Route 5. Route 5 between IR 481 (exit 3) and the Onondaga-Madison county line
in the Village of Fayetteville and the Towns of Dewitt and Manlius. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8131.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
